text: Allakh razreshayet lovit' rybu v more i ispol'zovat' yeyo v pishchu vam i nakhodyashchimsya v puti, no On zapretil vam okhotit'sya na zhivotnykh na sushe, poka vy v ikhrame i sovershayete obryady khadzhzha i umry. Boytes' Allakha, strashites' Yego nakazaniya i bud'te poslushny Yemu! K Nemu vashe vozvrashcheniye v Sudnyy den', i On vozdast vam za to, chto vy delayete
